# Particle Jekyll Theme

![](./particle.jpg)


The Theme features:

- Gulp
- SASS
- Sweet Scroll
- Particle.js
- BrowserSync
- Font Awesome and Devicon icons
- Google Analytics
- Info Customization


## License

This theme is free and open source software, distributed under the The MIT License. So feel free to use this Jekyll theme anyway you want.
